Definition: Read the text and output "yes" if it has abusive content. We consider the content to be abusive if it contains any of the following: (1) Identity Directed Abuse, (2) Affiliation Directed Abuse, (3) Person Directed Abuse, or (4) Counter Speech. If the text does not contain any abusive content, output "no".
